text: Digital art is the practice of art that uses digital technology to make it. Names for digital art have changed since the 1960s. Some of these names are computer art and multimedia art. Digital art is a part of new media art.Christiane Paul (2006). Digital Art, pp. 7–8. Thames & Hudson.Lieser, Wolf. Digital Art. Langenscheidt: h.f. ullmann. 2009, pp. 13–15 Anything produced or made on digital media, such as animations, photographs, illustrations, videos, digital paintings, and such can be classified as digital art. It encompasses a wide range of techniques, from digital drawings, paintings and illustration, to photos, videos and even sculpture. == Types of digital art == * Art game * ASCII art * E-books * Electronic music * Poems == Related pages == * Computer graphics * Graphic arts == References == == Other websites == * * Dreher, Thomas. "History of Computer Art" * Zorich, Diane M. "Transitioning to a Digital World" Category:Art
title: Digital art
